animation: Your compassion could be a game changer.
Help us give them a better life.
donatePage.descriptionMain: Join us in making a difference in the lives of animals in need. Your support helps provide food, shelter, and medical care.
donatePage.descriptionForm: Support our furry friends in need
donatePage.amount200: Provides food for 2 pets for a week
donatePage.amount500: Covers basic veterinary check-up for 1 pet
donatePage.amount1000: Supports vaccination and medicine for 2 pets
donatePage.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.

adoptPage.welcomeDescription: Join our community of pet lovers and discover everything you need to know about pet care, health, and happiness.
adoptPage.careAdviceDescription: Expert tips for keeping your pets healthy and happy
adoptPage.veterinaryHelpDescription: Professional medical care when you need it most
adoptPage.ourTipsDescription: Daily guidance for better pet parenting
adoptPage.adoptionProcessDescription: Learn about our simple and rewarding adoption process.
adoptPage.makeDifferenceDescription: Your donation helps us provide food, shelter, and medical care to animals in need. Every contribution, no matter how small, can change a life.

01.title: Select your destiny friends
01.description: The first step that you have to do is sign in to join our community, then you can access through all our website

02.title: Put your detail in the form
02.description: Unlike low-cost carriers (Spirit, Frontier, etc.), which have already discounted their service down to a wholesale level, normal legacy carriers have markups that shoot their prices up. We bypass them.

03.title: Wait for the confirmation
03.description: Denver has tons of flights and tons of empty seats. Aspen, not so much. Major cities mean major savings. Plus, they typically have large airports which also have larger flights.

04.title: Get an interview date!
04.description: Unlike low-cost carriers (Spirit, Frontier, etc.), which have already discounted their service down to a wholesale level, normal legacy carriers have markups that shoot their prices up. We bypass them.

register.title: Sign Up On Friendly Pow
register.rightContentText: Sign up to become part of our growing community. Connect with like-minded individuals, share your ideas, and explore new opportunities. Your journey with Friendly Pow starts here!

login.title: Log in / Sign Up On Circle
login.rightContentText: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

adoptPageMain.maincontent: Our friends who are looking for a house

adoptForm.adoptionFormDescription: Fill out this form to begin your adoption journey
adoptForm.welcomeMessage2: . Thank you for considering adoption through Friendly Paws.
adoptForm.aloneHours: If no one is home, how many hours will the dog be alone?
adoptForm.canWalkDog: I can walk the dog on a leash
adoptForm.homeDuringDay: Is anyone home during the day?
adoptForm.adoptionReason: Tell us why you want to adopt this little guy?

validation.fnPattern: Firstname can only contain letters (Thai or English)
validation.lnPattern: Lastname can only contain letters (Thai or English)
validation.psPattern: Password must be at least 8 characters a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and special characters
validation.salaryMin: Salary must be a positive number
validation.dateOfBirthRequired: Please enter your date of birth
validation.socialContact: Please enter your social contact information
validation.currentPetCountRequired: Please enter the number of pets you currently have
validation.currentPetCountMin: The number of pets cannot be negative
validation.currentPetDetails: Please provide details of your current pets
validation.familyMemberCountRequired: Please enter the number of family members
validation.familyMemberCountMin: There must be at least one family member
validation.familyAlwaysHomeRequired: Please indicate if someone is always home
validation.aloneHours: Please enter the number of hours the pet will be alone
validation.why: Please explain why you want to adopt
